name: Thunderstruck
description:
Catch the lightning, power up your cannons and defend the castle
on our entry for Super BR Jam!

Thunderstruck is a tower defense/platformer made for the 2013 Super Br Jam, a game jam which great brazilian studios were invited to create games for charity.

Razzle's castle is under attack and suffering from a power outage! You must help him by collecting energy from thunders and charging the defensive cannons. The monsters will attack with extreme force for 5 minutes.

Good Luck with that!
